short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight the players who appear on MLB's Top Prospect list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight players who are among the top 100 prospects and show scouting information from MLB Pipeline. Great for staying on top of up-and-coming rookies! Works with ESPN, Yahoo, CBS Sports, and Fantrax leagues.
